clinical_study.brief_title: The Study to Evaluate Patient Outcome Using Distal Protection Combined With the BX Velocity.
clinical_study.official_title: Distal Protection Combined With Velocity in Coronary Arteries and SVBG Registry.

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective is to evaluate the use of the AngioGuard™ device combined with the Bx Velocity™ on patient outcome at one month.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a prospective, non-randomized, multi-center trial. Patients will be treated with the AngioGuard™ device and Bx Velocity™ stent and will be followed for six-months post-procedure.

primary_outcome.measure: clinical success of the AngioGuard™ device combined with the Bx Velocity™ stent

secondary_outcome.measure: successful placement and retrieval without embolic occlusions of vessels distal to the position of the device

arm_group.description: AngioGuard™ device and Bx Velocity™ stent

intervention.intervention_name: emboli capturing guidewire device combined with stent
intervention.description: AngioGuard™ device and Bx Velocity™ stent
